sentences.en: He asked only that Ingrid stop behaving so scandalously.
sentences.cn: 他只是要求英格丽德不要再这么不像话了。

sentences.en: he decided to stop over in Paris.
sentences.cn: 他决定在巴黎稍作停留。

sentences.en: He insisted we stop at a small restaurant just outside of Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 他坚持让我们在亚特兰大市外不远的一家小餐馆歇歇脚。

sentences.en: He stopped suddenly when he saw Ruth.
sentences.cn: 他一看到露丝，便突然停住了。

sentences.en: He stopped the car and got out.
sentences.cn: 他把车停住并下了车。

sentences.en: he would stop at nothing to retain his position of power.
sentences.cn: 他会不惜一切来保住自己的权力地位。

sentences.en: I lay the painting flat to stop the wet paint running.
sentences.cn: 我把油画平放以防止未干的颜料流动。

sentences.en: I saw Louise walking slowly to the bus stop.
sentences.cn: 我看见路易丝慢慢地走向公共汽车站。

sentences.en: I stopped off to visit him and his wife.
sentences.cn: 我中途停下来去拜访他和他的妻子。

sentences.en: I was worried that the security guards would stop us at the gate.
sentences.cn: 我担心警卫会把我们挡在门口。

sentences.en: I’m leaving now, and you can’t stop me.
sentences.cn: 我现在就要走了，你阻止不了我。

sentences.en: I've been told to lose weight and stop smoking.
sentences.cn: 我被告知要减肥并戒烟。

sentences.en: Our next stop will be York.
sentences.cn: 我们下一站是约克。

sentences.en: People who lead busy lives have no time to stop and reflect.
sentences.cn: 忙忙碌碌的人们无暇停下来反思。

sentences.en: she would have to put a stop to all this nonsense.
sentences.cn: 她得制止所有这样的胡闹。

sentences.en: Stop asking questions! You should know when enough is enough.
sentences.cn: 别问问题了！你应该知道什么时候该适可而止。

sentences.en: Stop throwing those stones!
sentences.cn: 别再扔那些石头了！

sentences.en: Stop! Come back!
sentences.cn: 停下，回来！

sentences.en: The criticisms will not stop people flocking to see the film.
sentences.cn: 批评的声音不会阻止人们涌到影院观看这部电影。

sentences.en: the director pulled out all the stops to meet the impossible deadline.
sentences.cn: 导演全力以赴来赶不可能达到的最后期限。

sentences.en: The government tried to stop publication of the book.
sentences.cn: 政府企图阻止这本书出版。

sentences.en: The next stop on this cruise is likely to be in Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 此次航游的下一站很可能是在康沃尔。

sentences.en: They might be wise to stop advertising on television.
sentences.cn: 他们不妨停止在电视上做广告，这样做可能是明智之举。

sentences.en: They would move heaven and earth to stop me if they could.
sentences.cn: 可能的话，他们会千方百计地阻止我。

sentences.en: This is your stop, isn’t it?
sentences.cn: 你在这一站下车，对不对？

sentences.en: Trains will operate from Waterloo with a pick-up stop at Ashford.
sentences.cn: 火车从滑铁卢站出发，途中会在阿什福德站停靠上人。

sentences.en: We took time to stop and admire the view.
sentences.cn: 我们特意驻足欣赏风景。

sentences.en: When I asked him to stop, he would not listen.
sentences.cn: 我叫他停下，可他不听。

sentences.en: When we stop enjoying ourselves we'll knock it on the head.
sentences.cn: 等玩够了，我们就会结束。

sentences.en: Work on the project has come to a stop because of lack of funding.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏资金，这个项目已经停工。

trans.tran_en: if an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening
to prevent someone from doing something or something from happening
to not walk, move, or travel any more, or to make someone or something do this

trans.tran_cn: 使停止，结束，阻碍，逗留，扣除
trans.tran_en: to block a hole or pipe so that water, smoke etc cannot go through it
to prevent someone from doing something or something from happening
